content: Case type
Form I90
First name
James
Last name
Smeth
Email
james.e.smith90@gmail.com
Phone number
hello
Hello! Let's continue. What is your Alien Registration Number (A-Number)?
What is your middle name (if any)?
Edward
Has your name legally changed since the issuance of your Permanent Resident Card? If so, please provide your current legal name.
no
Do you have a USCIS Online Account Number? (if any)
no
What is your mailing address, including street, city, state, and ZIP code?
555 Maple Avenue, Apt 322, Seattle, WA, 98122
Is there a name "In Care Of" associated with your mailing address? (if applicable)
no
What is your apartment or unit number? (if applicable)
If your physical address is different from your mailing address, what is your physical address, including street, city, state, and ZIP code?
no, same
What is your date of birth? (mm/dd/yyyy)
In which city or town were you born?
Monteal, Canada
In which country were you born?
Canad
What is your class of admission?
IR1
On what date did you become a lawful permanent resident? (mm/dd/yyyy)
Do you have a U.S. Social Security Number? If yes, please provide it.
no
What is your gender? (Male/Female)
Male
What is your height in feet and inches? (e.g., 5 feet 7 inches)
6 feet 8 inches
What is your weight in pounds?
What is your eye color? (Options: brown, blue, green, etc.)
brown
What is your hair color? (Options: black, brown, blond, etc.)
black
What is your ethnicity? (Hispanic or Latino, Not Hispanic or Latino)
Latino
What is your race? (Options: Native Hawaiian, White, Asian, etc.)
White
What is your mother's first name?
Margret
What is your father's first name?
Hiccup
What is the expiration date of your current Green Card? (mm/dd/yyyy)
Have you previously applied for Form I-90? If yes, when?
non
Have you experienced any issues receiving your Green Card in the past? (e.g., lost, stolen, delayed, or not received)
stolen

Why are you applying to replace or renew your Green Card? Please select the reason from the following options:

1. My previous card has been lost, stolen, or destroyed.
2. My previous card was issued but never received.
3. My existing card has been mutilated.
4. My existing card has incorrect data due to a Department of Homeland Security error.
5. My name or other biographic information has been legally changed since the issuance of my existing card.
6. My existing card has already expired or will expire within six months.
7. I have reached my 14th birthday and am registering as required.
8. I am a permanent resident who is taking up commuter status.
9. I am a commuter who is taking up actual residence in the United States.
10. I have been automatically converted to lawful permanent resident status.
11. I have a prior edition of the Alien Registration Card or am applying to replace my current Permanent Resident Card for another reason not specified above.
What is your current status? (Options: Lawful Permanent Resident, Permanent Resident - Commuter Status, Conditional Permanent Resident)
LPR
Have you ever been placed in exclusion, deportation, or removal proceedings or ordered removed from the United States? If yes, please provide details.
Yes, I was placed in removal proceedings in 2018 due to overstay of visa. The case was resolved on [date], with [outcome, e.g., voluntary departure, adjustment of status].
Since becoming a permanent resident, have you ever filed Form I-407 to abandon your lawful permanent resident status? If yes, please provide details.
no
Since becoming a permanent resident, have you ever been arrested, detained, charged, or convicted of any crime in the U.S. or abroad? If yes, please provide details.
no
Are you willing to attend a biometric services appointment where USCIS will collect your fingerprints, photograph, and signature? (This is required for Form I-90 processing.)
No, should I take it?
Yes, attending a biometric services appointment is required for Form I-90 processing. Would you like to confirm your willingness to attend?
okay

Do you require any accommodations due to disabilities or impairments for your biometrics appointment? If yes, select any applicable option:

1. I am deaf or hard of hearing and require an accommodation (e.g., sign-language interpreter, specify language).
2. I am blind or have low vision and require an accommodation.
3. I have another type of disability or impairment. (Please describe the accommodation needed.)
4. No accommodations needed.
Thank you for providing all the necessary information. I will now save your details to the database. Please hold on for a moment.
Thank you for providing all the necessary information. I will now save your details to the database. Please hold on for a moment.
Your information has been successfully saved, and your case status is "Qualified". If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out. Thank you!
